articles.content:
Greetings to Foreign Minister of Croatia 
    Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Miomir Ziuzul on his appointment as foreign minister of Croatia.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished him success in implementing his new duty.

articles.title: Proposal of Joint Meeting Supported
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Croatia 
    Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ivo Sanader on his appointment as prime minister of Croatia.
 Expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his responsible work.
